bibl.title: Historiography, Hagiography, and the Making of the Coptic "Church of the Martyrs" in Early Islamic Egypt.
bibl.note: Revised version of a paper delivered at the colloquium "Saints and Syncretism", jointly organized by the three programs of study at Dumbarton Oaks in March 2002.
PAPACONSTANTINOU Arietta, Historiography, Hagiography, and the Making of the Coptic "Church of the Martyrs" in Early Islamic Egypt.
